title: SMELLEZE Natural Yard Odor Remover Deodorizer: 2 lb. Granules Eliminate Outdoor Pet Urine & Stool Smell. Long Lasting. People, Pet, Plant & Planet Safe.
features: SIMPLY SPRINKLE YARD SMELLS AWAY: For a fresher yard, simply scatter SMELLEZE generously on areas with odor and repeat as needed. SMELLEZE eliminates offensive yard odors using natural ingredients. It draws in urine, fecal, ammonia, pet, animal, rodent, and other outdoor odors like a strong magnet, absorbs them like a sponge, and removes them safely without smelly cover-ups. Due to its porous nature, SMELLEZE has a huge capacity to continuously absorb large amounts of outdoor odors.

LONGEST LASTING EFFECTIVENESS: SMELLEZE has the unique capability to be automatically rejuvenated in sunlight and heat for the longest lasting effectiveness even after it gets wet from rainfall or watering. Furthermore, as the SMELLEZE granules accumulate in your soil, you will need less and less to provide the same odor control over a longer period to save you energy and time. It will also reduces wetness and spotting by absorbing urine.

SAFE FOR PEOPLE, PETS & THE PLANET: Formulated from all-natural ingredients, this SMELLEZE deodorizer is fragrance and cruelty free. It is one of the safest and most efficient ways to protect your yard from pet urine, stool, vomit and other outdoor smells. As an added advantage, your plants will benefit from the nutritional value SMELLEZE provides.

PURIFY YOUR AIR & BREATHE CLEAN: The granules can be also placed in porous bags or bowls to remove airborne odor. Unlike sprays that only work temporarily, SMELLEZE works non-stop 24/7 to remove the actual molecules causing urine, stool, vomit and other smells instead of masking them with scents or using harmful ingredients. By attacking the source of the odor problem, SMELLEZE cleans your soil and improves air quality.

MADE RIGHT IN THE USA & BACKED BY OUR SUPPORT: SMELLEZE has been made exclusively in the USA for over 15 years and has a proven track record. In addition to supporting American workers, SMELLEZE also enjoys a smaller carbon footprint that helps fight climate change. If you donâ€™t absolutely love SMELLEZE or are unhappy for any reason, we will reimburse you.
